content.rendered:
[vc_section css=”.vc_custom_1599827926864{margin-right: 100px !important;margin-left: 100px !important;}”][vc_row tlg_padding=”pt0 pb0″][vc_column]

Why Choose Us
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
Weather Resistance
[vc_column_text]A longer useful life means peace of mind and a great looking window that continues to improve the value of your biggest asset, your home. Extreme temperatures and severe weather exposure do not affect our doors and windows, continually performing in all conditions.[/vc_column_text]
Maintenance Free
[vc_column_text]Our doors and windows do not require expensive maintenance. They will not rot, warp nor corrode, even in tropical and salty coastal climates. Maintenance is simply quick and easy to clean.[/vc_column_text]
High Security
[vc_column_text]Our highly secure windows and doors offer the best solution for increased safety in your home. Our special fittings, glazing, and expert installation provide enhanced security for your family.[/vc_column_text]
High Sound Insulation
[vc_column_text]In our busy lives the hustle and bustle of every day living leaves us craving a little peace and quiet when we want it. Protection from the sound is an important character of our windows and doors, ensuring a comfortable life, both at home and in the office.[/vc_column_text]
Thermal Efficiency
[vc_column_text]We’ve got you covered in all climates. From the hottest summers to the iciest winters, our windows and doors allow you to enjoy a perfectly comfortable atmosphere.[/vc_column_text]
Fire Safety
[vc_column_text]Our doors and windows are naturally flame retardant throughout their entire life. They will not cause, support, or enhance the development of accidental fire. Unlike timber, our doors and windows do not support combustion and are in fact self-extinguishing.[/vc_column_text]
Material and Structural Performance
[vc_column_text]Our material compound performs and exceeds worldwide standards for strength, durability, heat stability, color retention, and termite resistant.[/vc_column_text]
Maximum Water Tightness
[vc_column_text]Our doors and windows have been successfully used in swimming pool facilities, marine, and oceanic environments without any detriment to its surface finish. Weather tightness and its resistance to driving rain is one of the main assets of our doors and windows.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section]
